pre.st: Gofer new url: 'http://smalltalkhub.com/mc/spasojev/ObjectRepoGatherer/main/';package: 'ConfigurationOfObjectRepoGatherer'; load.(Smalltalk at: #ConfigurationOfObjectRepoGatherer) loadDevelopment.Author fullName: 'me'.

analysis.st: Author fullName: 'me'. Transcript show: '@@OR-START@@';cr. ObjectRepoDataGatherer new emfPoweredAnalysis.

post.sh:
LOADED_ON=`cat loadedOn.txt` echo "db = db.getSiblingDB('objectRepo');db.objectRepoT$LOADED_ON.ensureIndex({snippet: 1, className: 1}, {unique: true, dropDups: true});" > OR-after.js
PERCENT=`echo "\`cat simpleParallelBash/standardOutput/* | grep @@BoriS | wc -l\` * 100 / \`tail -n 1 simpleParallelBash/input.txt\`" | bc` if [[ $PERCENT -ge 70 ]]; then echo "db.objectRepo.drop(); db.objectRepoT$LOADED_ON.copyTo('objectRepo')" >> OR-after.js fi
# mongo OR-after.js

pre.st: Gofer new url: 'http://smalltalkhub.com/mc/spasojev/ClassClash/main/';package: 'ConfigurationOfClassClashBackEnd'; load.(Smalltalk at: #ConfigurationOfClassClashBackEnd) loadDevelopment.

post.sh:
LOADED_ON=`cat loadedOn.txt` TOTAL=`tail -n 1 simpleParallelBash/input.txt` SUCC=`cat simpleParallelBash/standardOutput/* | grep @@BoriS | wc -l` PERCENT=`echo "$SUCC * 100 / $TOTAL" | bc` if [[ $PERCENT -ge 70 ]]; then echo "db = db.getSiblingDB('classClash');db.classClash.drop(); db.classClash$LOADED_ON.copyTo('classClash')" > classClash-after.js fi
mongo classClash-after.js
